text: My LC Lauren Conrad line has seen countless collections over the past nine years. I never could have imagined how much it would grow and transform, and I ’ m so grateful for those of you that have purchased pieces since the brand ’ s inception. From the shipments that you expect to see every month to capsules like my LC Runway collection, I have had the time of my life creating and designing it all for you. As of now my LC Lauren Conrad line has expanded to include everything from apparel, accessories, and home décor. That being said, it can be tricky to navigate the entire collection so I thought I ’ d share 10 of my favorite pieces with you today. From cozy, season appropriate picks to classic staples, let me walk you through it all. Keep scrolling to
